inst 1: to disable the banner, set the message below to empty quotes
inst 2: set type to 'warning' for a yellow banner, set to 'danger' for a red banner
message: Borough Hall closed for the holiday on Mon, Oct 10 - Section 2A Recycling & Section 2B Sanitation will be collected. The Building Dept will be closed to the public for administrative purposes on the following Fridays: Oct 14, Oct 28, Nov 4 & Nov 18.
